body_html:
We are working on our installation documents to remove references to conda repos.

i wonder how hard it's to add/remove/update some line from the document. so some guys like me don't go through a lot of trouble and need to after hours of googling reach here and see there is no support for python 3.6 under windows

> We are working on our installation documents to remove references to conda repos.

i wonder how hard it's to add/remove/update some line from the document. so some guys like me don't go through a lot of trouble and need to after hours of googling reach here and see there is no support for python 3.6 under windows
